column4: Can anyone help me with this upgrade error... I've checked the forums and tried a lot but no success:  http://paste.ubuntu.com/1139039/
Is there more to this output?
- yes, please see http://paste.ubuntu.com/1140522/ for the whole thing...
Give me a copy of your /etc/apt/sources.lst file
And then 'sudo apt-get clean && sudo apt-get update'
That file is huge, you want the whole thing?
If you could find lines that contain either "libasound2" or "UsePackage2"
here you go... is it the " between ok and installed?  http://paste.ubuntu.com/1140542/
Replace that line with 'Status: install ok installed'
That fixed the initial problem :)  The reason it got that way was it crashed out of an upgrade from 11 to 12 and I just haven't been working on fixing it until now
Oh, I guess that makes some sense.
Now I get this error when I try to upgrade the files I have... http://paste.ubuntu.com/1140549/   is this hopeless?
Uhh, I don't see an error, just warnings.
Here is the info for apg from the status file - http://paste.ubuntu.com/1140558/
I really recommend you check out that debian page though, can I see a copy of git-core though?
There is no more error of git-core.  You still want me to search for it and past it?
